comment.text: They said she is under investigation and chargers will be brought against her ...why elect Hillary Clinton when she is felon and is going to be arrested. She doesn't talk about how she is under investigation for 650 k emails and her name is on them ...no one should vote for her. She continues to lie lie lie....
